abstract: ImClone Systems, the biotechnology company which rebuffed a $60-per-share takeover offer from Bristol-Myers Squibb, said on Thursday it hired JPMorgan Chase as its financial adviser.
snippet: ImClone Systems, the biotechnology company which rebuffed a $60-per-share takeover offer from Bristol-Myers Squibb, said on Thursday it hired JPMorgan Chase as its financial adviser.
lead_paragraph: ImClone Systems, the biotechnology company which rebuffed a $60-per-share takeover offer from Bristol-Myers Squibb, said on Thursday it hired JPMorgan Chase as its financial adviser.

abstract: JPMorgan Chase on Thursday raised $1.6 billion in hybrid securities to bolster its balance sheet but had to pledge to pay a high interest rate to lure investors.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase on Thursday raised $1.6 billion in hybrid securities to bolster its balance sheet but had to pledge to pay a high interest rate to lure investors.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase raised $1.6 billion in hybrid securities on Thursday to bolster its balance sheet but had to pledge to pay a high interest rate to lure investors.

headline.main: JPMorgan Raises $1.6 Billion in Hybrid Securities

abstract: One day after JPMorgan Chase and Morgan Stanley reached separate settlements with New York’s attorney general over the sale of auction-rate securities, Wachovia said Friday it agreed to buy back $8.5 billion of the troubled assets from its customers.
snippet: One day after JPMorgan Chase and Morgan Stanley reached separate settlements with New York’s attorney general over the sale of auction-rate securities, Wachovia said Friday it agreed to buy back $8.5 billion of the troubled assets from its custome...

headline.main: As Wachovia Settles, Merrill Feels the Heat
